data.prayer: Over 21.82 percent of the people of Triesen are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Triesen, Liechtenstein

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Triesen, Liechtenstein to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Triesen, Liechtenstein to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Triesen.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Triesen, Liechtenstein a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Triesen to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 30 believers in Triesen that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.section_summary:
the state of Triesen, Liechtenstein has a population of 5,400.

We estimate Triesen has 30 people who might know Jesus, 4,191 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,178 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 179 neighbors who need Jesus.
